<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from display_value="Run Server Side Script">7b544f2607e101102673f4be7c1ed0e2</copied_from><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes/><order>7</order><snapshot/><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-14 17:45:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>93cd9a6307e101102673f4be7c1ed037</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="canWrite" source="x_402400_canwrite">d89efe6a07a101102673f4be7c1ed026</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="canWrite">d89efe6a07a101102673f4be7c1ed026</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_93cd9a6307e101102673f4be7c1ed037</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-14 17:47:06</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="Can Write copy">7acdd26307e101102673f4be7c1ed09b</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=93cd9a6307e101102673f4be7c1ed037"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>93cd9a6307e101102673f4be7c1ed037</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-14 17:45:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>5fcd9a6307e101102673f4be7c1ed037</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-14 17:45:26</sys_updated_on><value>(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual) {

    describe('When Conditional ACL is NOT Active & Short Description ACL IS active,', function() {
		
        var glideRecord = new GlideRecord('x_402400_canwrite_glideelement');

		describe('Role on ' + glideRecord.getClassDisplayValue(), function() {

            it('CAN Write record', function() {
                checkWrite(glideRecord, true);
            });

            var glideElement = 'short_description';

            it('CAN Write to ' + glideElement + ' field', function() {
                checkWrite(glideRecord.getElement(glideElement), true);
            });
        });
    });

    function checkWrite(object, expected) {
        var result = object.canWrite();
        expect(result).toBe(expected);
    }

})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
jasmine.getEnv().randomizeTests(false);
jasmine.getEnv().execute();</value><variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>93cd9a6307e101102673f4be7c1ed037</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-14 17:45:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>9bcd9a6307e101102673f4be7c1ed037</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-14 17:45:26</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="Jasmine version">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
